Posts.Content: Hi, I have a friend who had a invasive ductal breast cancer a year ago. She is 47 year old. She was operated, received chemotherapy and radiotherapy. Today she went to mamography of other breast and there is something very suspisious in her other breast. She will go to her surgent on monday.  She is desperate and so am I. She is very disapoited in doctors cause the radiotherapy ends a month ago. She recently heard about the Breuss total therapy. Is there anybody who try this therapy and get cured?
Posts.Title: breuss
